git.commitMessage:
feat: Add side betting system v5.0.0

Implement complete side betting system for players and spectators:

Backend:
- Add side_bets table to schema.sql
- Create sideBets.ts with CRUD operations and coin management
- Create sideBets socket handlers for real-time betting
- Add SideBet types to game.ts

Frontend:
- Add SideBetsPanel component with slide-out panel design
- Add CreateBetModal for preset/custom bet creation
- Add Side Bets button to GameHeader with notification badge
- Integrate into PlayingPhase with controlled props

Features:
- Preset bets: red 0 winner, brown 0 victim, bet made, etc.
- Custom bets with free-text description
- Auto-resolution for preset bets
- Manual resolution with dispute handling for custom bets
- Coin balance management with transactions
- Real-time notifications for bet events
- Mobile-friendly responsive design
